item.title: iPod touch - Apple
item.description:
iPod touch - Apple

What started as a speculative project became the real deal, running in countries around the world and online as Apple's first iPod touch commercial.

item.title: Have a #smartbreak - a director's test ad - Using Blackmagic Pocket RAW
item.description:
Have a #smartbreak - a director's test ad - Using Blackmagic Pocket RAW

Introducing the world's first wearable #smartbreak. This app for the Pebble measures your activity, reminding you exactly when to Have a break, Have a KitKat® Director: Nick Haley Creative Director: Barry Christie Producer: Joseph Bassary Editor: Nick Haley Colourist: Dan Moran @ Smoke & Mirrors Sound engineer: Leaf Troup @ Hogarth Music: digital mystic by silencide (http://www.silencide.com) remixed/adapted by Nick Haley under CC 3.0-SA.

item.title: Welcome to Shell (Director's Cut)
item.description:
Welcome to Shell (Director's Cut)

This is "Welcome to Shell (Director's Cut)" by Nick Haley on Vimeo, the home for high quality videos and the people who love them.
